1370: Gerrit moved to St. Joris straet.A.3 after marriage.
Got married to Riet at age 23 in 1370.
1371: Had a daughter with Riet, Ghodelde, at age 24.
1372: Had a son with Riet, Lubertus, at age 25.
1373: Had a son with Riet, Raso, at age 26.
1377: Had a daughter with Riet, Alene, at age 30.
1378: Had a daughter with Riet, Jute, at age 31.
Lost daughter Alene when Alene was 2 years old.
1381: Had a son with Riet, Reuro, at age 34.
1384: Had a daughter with Riet, Wendelmodis, at age 37.
1391: Lost son Reuro when Reuro was 11 years old.
